reviewText:
I actually tried to take time out from my busy job and do a proper review, for broader clarification on what makes this a 5 star movie, not a '1'.

I think if you're going to judge something you have to make a valid argument for its demerits, not just some half formed impressions, when you went there looking for 'BooBs'

Let's address the subject of nudity first. There is little nudity in the movie itself - that was hardly the point.

However, if you go to the 'extra features' I would say you will see some of the finest representations of the female form, we as a species are ever likely to: I only envy the film-makers who were privy to such exquisite mammaries as those on display in the extras.
Stupid, horrible movie. There are better ways to waste an hour and 17 minutes of your life then watching this POC. Two women are topless

The only reason I bought this was because Shay Astar was supposed to be in it, but she barely was. So it's misleading that she appears on the cover. Other than that it is a very silly and stupid movie. Possibly the worst movie ever made!
